hero.title: Refubook
hero.subtitle: Express Freely
hero.content: Share your stories and experiences, expand your ideas freely and read other's stories, all under one website.

about-section.title: About Us
about-section.content: Refubook is one of Columbia university projects, it aims to help refugees help each others by writing their experiences and ideas.

featuresContent.reliability: Reliability in statistics and psychometrics is the overall consistency of a measure.
featuresContent.motivation: DescriptionMotivation is the experience of desire or aversion. As such, motivation has both an objective aspect and an internal or subjective aspect.
featuresContent.efficiency: DescriptionEfficiency is the amount of divisions ordered from a task. In more mathematical or scientific terms.
featuresContent.creativity: Creativity is a phenomenon whereby something new and somehow valuable is formed. The created item may be intangible or a physical object.
featuresContent.socialCommunication: Social Communication refers to language that is used in social situations. This refers to a child's ability to use language to interact with others in a variety of situations.
featuresContent.valuableIdeas: Everyone is looking for valuable ideas. Those ideas that have the power to change the way you think, act or see the world.
featuresContent.experiences: DescriptionExperience is the process through which conscious organisms perceive the world around them.
featuresContent.friendlyCommunity: Enables people from all conflict-effected countris to actively participate in community activities and treats everyone with respect, regardless of their nationalities or ethnicities.

stories-section.title: Latest Stories
stories-section.subtitle: Discover the newest article written by an experinced refugees, take advantages of it or share your feedback with them.

about.title: About
about.section-content: REACH is a regional initiative of the Center for Sustainable Development at Columbia University which aims to bridge the gap in health literacy and health care access among refugee and local youth living in Turkey and Lebanon, and it is implemented in partnership with the Columbia Global Center in Istanbul as well as universities and NGOs supporting refugee and youth health initiatives in Turkey and Lebanon.
